title: A Brief But Spectacular take on adapting to new challenges while living with autism

media:group.media:title: A Brief But Spectacular take on adapting to new challenges while living with autism
media:group.media:description:
Pierce and Melissa McKay are a mother and son living in Brentwood, Tennessee, just outside of Nashville. When the COVID pandemic began, the McKays found themselves without the vital school and community resources Pierce needed to navigate life as an autistic adult. They share their Brief But Spectacular take on adapting to new challenges while living with autism.
